title: The Strongest Sect of All Times - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Martial Arts   Supernatural   Xuanhuan
tags: Adapted to Manhua   Cheats   Cultivation   Fast Cultivation   Leadership   Male Protagonist   Misunderstandings   Overpowered Protagonist   Parody   Poor to Rich   Sect Development   System Administrator   Transmigration   Weak to Strong
author: Goodbye Jianghu   江湖再见
description:
This is a story about developing a sect, a story of a family filled with warmth and happiness. 

Not only do we have a funny Patriarch, but there are also a bunch of weird disciples with very different personalities.

Come on, youngsters.

Join our sect and together we will make our dreams soar!>
